message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $11,000. I'm confident this will be a great deal for you.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. However, that price is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. What do you think?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,000 is significantly below its value. I could meet you halfway at $10,000. This is my final offer.
Hi Alice, I understand your position but I have a strict budget.  Could we settle at $9,500? I'm hoping we can make a deal work.
